Name: UMA-War VR
About the game: Listen, fighter! An UFO crashed down a few days before and the world is suffering the attack by a huge amount of Unidentified Mysterious Animal---UMA. You have to pick up your weapon to protect your own planet. Gameplay: Once enter the game, you will see many UMAs in front of you. Your job is to use the bow or the crossbow to shoot the UMAs. The higher level, the more UMAs. Remember, you can only use the arrow of the same color to shoot the UMAs and you have to dodge the attack from the UMAs as well. By shooting the flying boxes, you will get many surprises such as “speed shooting”, “A flock of Arrows” and “Super bomb” which help you score more points. At last, the ranking board will allow you to compete with other players from all over the world. Key features: Cute Cartoon Style! Fun and simply gameplay!! Different maps and weapons to choose!!! Full of Surprises in the game!!!! AN interesting VR game suitable for players of any level and any age!!!!! What are you waiting for? Come and join us in this fancy world!
